content:
addRule()
	.when(Query.fromType(org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.model.JavaSourceFileModel)
		.as(default)
)
	.perform(Iteration.over(?).perform(AttachJavaSourceInformationToGraph.and(Commit
			.every(100))
			.and(IterationProgress{msg=Index Java Source Files, int=250, est=true}))
)
withId("IndexJavaSourceFilesRuleProvider_1")
